channel.title: Chapter 8: On A Rail Engine Error IMG
channel.description:
Firstly, my eng. is bad. so sorry :frowning:
Ride in a yellow train, first loading screen, game shut down.
Error Description: Engine Error
failed to luck vertex buffer in CMeshDX8::LockVertexBuffer
Engine Error in the previous game screen:
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/939255420009666178/0473BA6FC5B925F8ED383120146229A663D2FAA1/[/img]
